input.sentences: here is the father of the bride .
here is my husband holding our kid .
look at the happy couple that got married .
this is their first kiss as bride and groom .
lovely picture of them kissing by the water .
output.sentences: Mr Jones looks as if he just realised how much money he spend on his daughter's wedding.
There were many happy guests at the ceremony.
The best man and the bride and grooms watched the flower girl walk down the isle.
The minister proudly confirms the couple as man and wife.
Mr and Mrs. Beckham are very happy at their reception.
